trump.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a card from the suit that has been chosen to have a higher value than the other suits in a particular game
trump.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to play a trump that beats someone elseâ€™s card in a game
trump.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to do better than someone else in a situation when people are competing with each other
trump.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: By wearing a simple but stunning dress, she had trumped them all.
